tool_description: Analyzes patient medical records to extract relevant clinical history, comorbidities, and treatment patterns for clinical trial screening assessment.

medical_records.description: Complete medical record text or summary

lookback_years.description: Years of medical history to analyze (1-20)

focus_conditions.description: Specific conditions to prioritize in analysis

error_messages: Invalid patient record: medical_records must be non-empty and contain structured clinical information.
Invalid lookback period: lookback_years must be between 1-20.
Patient ID format error: patient_id must be a valid identifier format.
Record parsing failed: Medical records lack sufficient structured data for analysis.
usage: Provide patient_id and medical_records text. Optionally specify lookback_years and focus_conditions to customize the analysis scope and priorities.

primary_diagnoses.description: List of primary diagnoses with dates

analysis_summary.description: Comprehensive summary of medical history analysis
